elements.description: Defines the lightbox element. When it's open, the lightbox will become a direct child of the Body. This will avoid all z-index, fixed position, and transform issues.
Defines the trigger that untransforms all parents of the fixed element.
Defines the trigger that returns the transforms to all parents of the fixed element.
Defines a trigger that toggles `on/off` the untransforms.

settings.description: Defines the timeout to wait before triggering the `off` state.
